ui.title: TFGBV Global Resources
ui.subtitle: Educational resources and international guides on online safety and Technology-Facilitated Gender-Based Violence (TFGBV).
ui.local_support_title: Need immediate support in the Philippines?
ui.local_support_desc: We've compiled specialized local resources for survivors of online harassment and gender-based violence.

chayn.name: CHAYN’s DIY Online Safety Guide
chayn.description: A comprehensive, survivor-led guide to staying safe online, covering topics from securing accounts to dealing with harassment.

australia_esafety.name: Australia’s E-Safety Guide
australia_esafety.description: A world-leading resource covering key topics in online safety, including deepfakes, cyberbullying, and image-based abuse.

unfpa.name: UNFPA: TFGBV Considerations
unfpa.description: A critical resource title: "Technology-facilitated gender-based violence: Considerations across the life course", exploring the impact of digital harm.

fma.name: Foundation for Media Alternatives (FMA)
fma.description: A Philippine-based NGO focused on the intersections of technology and human rights. Includes specific resources on gender-based violence and a dedicated helpline.

cnxus.name: She Leads Curriculum on TFGBV
cnxus.description: A specialized educational curriculum designed to empower leaders and advocates to address technology-facilitated gender-based violence.

svri.name: SVRI Global Library
svri.description: A vast repository of research and resources dedicated specifically to the intersection of technology and gender-based violence.
